message: I understand that you value high-quality products at $200 and low-quality ones at $0. Given that 80% of my products are high-quality, you might be hesitant to buy at $100.  However, for this particular product, I'm willing to stake my reputation on its quality. I strongly suggest purchasing this one.
I'm pleased you were satisfied with the last product. This one is another I'm confident in.  I encourage you to purchase it.
